metadata.title: Tim Niederer // Freelancing
metadata.description: Software development focusing on web and mobile development.

openGraph.title: Tim Niederer // Freelancing
openGraph.description: Software development focusing on web and mobile development.

home.offerDescription: The areas where I have gained the most experience so far are web and mobile development. I was usually also involved in the design. However, I also quickly and gladly familiarize myself with other technologies/platforms.
home.webDescription: Development for desktop and mobile - preferably with React / NextJS & NestJS.
home.mobileDescription: Cross-platform development for iOS & Android - preferably with Flutter
home.otherDescription: C & ESP32, C# & Unity, Java Swing/FX, ...
home.butDescription: Technology is secondary to me. I prefer to work on projects that I can/want to use myself. Through my own interest in the product, it is easiest for me to develop good solutions.
home.timeline2015: 2015 - started developing small projects in Java, C# and Web (HTML/CSS/JS) privately and later continued with Swift and C++
home.timeline2018: 2018 - Training as an IT specialist for application development in a small software company as a full-stack developer
home.timeline2021: 2021 - Takeover as a full-stack developer. Mainly in Typescript with React, React-Native, NodeJS, ExpressJS, MSSQL and MySQL but also Swift and C++.

experience.title: My Experience
experience.description: In my 8 years of computer science, I have already had contact points with most major technologies. I spent most of my time in the frontend, but I also enjoy working on backend or hardware projects. In the last 5 years, I have primarily been working with the following technologies:
